arcwelder_enable.label: Arc Welder
arcwelder_enable.description: Convert multiple G0/G1 arc segments into G2/G3 arc commands using Arc Welder.

arcwelder_maximum_radius.label: Maximum Arc Radius
arcwelder_maximum_radius.description: The maximum radius of any arc in mm for Arc Welder.

arcwelder_tolerance.label: Tolerance
arcwelder_tolerance.description: The maximum allowable difference between the arc path and the original toolpath for Arc Welder.

arcwelder_resolution.label: Resolution
arcwelder_resolution.description: The resolution in mm of the of the output for Arc Welder.  Determines the maximum tool path deviation allowed during conversion.

arcwelder_min_arc_segment.label: Min arc segments
arcwelder_min_arc_segment.description: The minimum number of segments in a full circle of the same radius as any given arc.  Can only be used if Mm per arc segment is also set. Used to compensate for firmware without min-arc-segments setting.

arcwelder_mm_per_arc_segment.label: Mm per arc segment
arcwelder_mm_per_arc_segment.description: The mm per arc segment as defined in your firmware. Used to compensate for firmware without min-arc-segments setting. Requires  that min-arc-segments be set.

arcwelder_allow_3d_arcs.label: Allow 3d arcs
arcwelder_allow_3d_arcs.description: 3D arcs will be allowed (supports spiral vase mode). Not all firmware supports this.
